markdownRemark.html:
Check Date

Works on 2019-03-07 14:09:16+0800

Question

How to exclude one word with grep

Answer

cat some.txt | grep -v 'exclude_word' > result.txt

Reference

  • https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4538253/how-can-i-exclude-one-word-with-grep

frontmatter.title: How Can I Exclude One Word With Grep
